1210270.name: Revhead - Turbo Pack
1210270.description:
Turbo Pack DLC contains more than 60 new components, which gives high performance customisation to the game. It introduces twin turbo setups, twin charged engines, intercoolers and additional air intakes to gain more horse power. Contents of this DLC allows the player to build cars with over 2000 horsepower!

  • Twin Turbo setups with manifolds for Inline and V engines
  • Twin Charged setups V engines (Turbo and Supercharger)
  • High performance Turbos (Magura, Buthanbang + SE version, Jingu, Narnoo SE, Camira SE, Euroa I and Euroa II)
  • Air scoop for chassis's roof in two sizes
  • Air scoop for engine's hood in two sizes
  • Integrated air intakes for headlights (one for all cars with left and right options)
  • Three strong Superchargers
  • A new inline 4 Euroa high performance engine with carburettor (310HP / 252Nm @6500 rpm)
  • High pressure Boost Gauges (Euroa, Buthanbang, Magura, Jingu, Narnoo)
  • High performance Intercoolers (Euroa I race and sport, Euroa II race, Kanji, Camira, Narnoo, Jingu, Magura, Panania)
1210270.supported_languages:
英语*, 捷克语, 丹麦语*, 匈牙利语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 罗马尼亚语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 荷兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 日语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
